title: Why cant nocturne go "Unstoppable" when he dashes in ult?
body: Its really annoying when i pass through a veigar stun and it screws everything up...

replies.body: He is unstoppable. If Veig's stun is stopping him, it's a bug.
Hm weird, certain snares make me freeze at the end of the ult

Nocturne's ult behaves the same way Malph's does. They're both unstoppable during the ult, they're not CC immune though, so can be CC'd and, if the duration's long enough, will still be CC'd after the ult ends. Ryze snare or Veigar stun for example won't stop them from completing their ults, but can limit them after they end if applied mid dash.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AX5TKYF7,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-01-10T02:20:41.001+0000)
>
> Nocturne's ult behaves the same way Malph's does. They're both unstoppable during the ult, they're not CC immune though, so can be CC'd and, if the duration's long enough, will still be CC'd after the ult ends. Ryze snare or Veigar stun for example won't stop them from completing their ults, but can limit them after they end if applied mid dash.

Can I Janna tornado them, because I'm pretty sure I can't unlike typical dashes.
oh ok thanks for clarifying that
You have a spell shield, right?
because that's wrong and he can pass through veigar stun when he ults.
Just like any other champion who passes through a Veigar stun. Don't pass through the event horizon.

You may never come back... Because not even Light can escape the gravity of a Black Hole!
